com.nokia.maps.map

Class GestureMapCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable
      • javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
        • com.nokia.maps.map.MapCanvas
          • com.nokia.maps.map.GestureMapCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapListener

    public abstract class GestureMapCanvas
extends MapCanvas
    This abstract base class extends the default behaviour of the MapCanvas to include Gesture support, any attached TouchComponent implementing an ExtendedEventListener shall receive gesture events such as pinch() and flick().

    • Constructor Detail

      • GestureMapCanvas

        public GestureMapCanvas(javax.microedition.lcdui.Display display,
                int resolution)
        Creates a new GestureMapCanvas with gesture support.
        Parameters:
        display - display object for the current MIDlet
        resolution - the tile resolution, either one of MapDisplay.MAP_RESOLUTION_AUTO, MapDisplay.MAP_RESOLUTION_128_x_128 or MapDisplay.MAP_RESOLUTION_256_x_256

      • GestureMapCanvas

        Creates new GestureMapCanvas with gesture support.
        Parameters:
        display - display object for the current MIDlet

    • Method Detail

      • isGestureSupported

        public final boolean isGestureSupported()
        This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether or not gesture is supported on this device.
        Returns:
        true if gesture is supported. false otherwise.

      • isPinchSupported

        public boolean isPinchSupported()
        This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether or not gesture supports pinch on this device.
        Returns:
        true if the pinch gesture is supported. false otherwise.

      • enableDoubleTapZoom

        public void enableDoubleTapZoom()
        This method enables the "zoom in on double tap" functionality.

      • disableDoubleTapZoom

        public void disableDoubleTapZoom()
        This method disables the "zoom in on double tap" functionality.

      • isDoubleZapZoomEnabled

        public boolean isDoubleZapZoomEnabled()
        This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether double tap zooming functionality is currently enabled.
        Returns:
        true if zoom in on double tap is enabled. false otherwise.
